statements: SELECT * FROM online_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Ebook';
SELECT resource_title, resource_link FROM online_resources ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT resource_title, resource_type FROM online_resources WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM online_resources WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resource_id, resource_title FROM online_resources WHERE resource_title LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT * FROM online_resources WHERE resource_type = 'article' ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT resource_title, resource_link FROM online_resources WHERE resource_type = 'video' AND resource_title LIKE '%tutorial%'
SELECT resource_id, resource_type, created_date FROM online_resources ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT resource_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM online_resources GROUP BY resource_type
SELECT * FROM online_resources WHERE resource_type IN ('article', 'video')
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type FROM resources ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT resource_name, url FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM student_materials WHERE is_completed = TRUE ORDER BY completed_at ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type, url, created_at FROM resources ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Document' AND url LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, resource_name, progress, is_completed FROM student_materials JOIN resources ON student_materials.resource_id = resources.resource_id WHERE progress > 0.5 ORDER BY progress DESC;

SELECT resource_name, url, completed_at FROM student_materials JOIN resources ON student_materials.resource_id = resources.resource_id WHERE student_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef' AND is_completed = TRUE ORDER BY completed_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type, COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM resources GROUP BY resource_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_resources DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Document';
SELECT * FROM subjects ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT subject_name, teacher FROM subjects WHERE department = 'Science';
SELECT student_id, subject_id, resource_id, date_accessed FROM student_records WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT resource_name, url FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'video';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources ORDER BY resource_type DESC;
SELECT subject_name, department FROM subjects WHERE teacher = 'John Doe' ORDER BY subject_name;
SELECT student_id, subject_id, resource_id, date_accessed FROM student_records WHERE date_accessed >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM students WHERE age >= 20;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, credits, instructor FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_id;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT resource_name, url FROM resources INNER JOIN courses ON resources.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, instructor, enrolled_students FROM Courses
SELECT student_name, email, joining_date FROM Students
SELECT material_name, material_type, upload_date FROM Materials
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments
SELECT student_id, course_id, rating, review_text FROM Reviews
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor, enrolled_students FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, email, joining_date FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY joining_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, enrolled_students FROM Courses WHERE enrolled_students > 50 ORDER BY enrolled_students DESC;
SELECT student_name, email, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 'Sophomore' AND joining_date > '2021-01-01';
